data.title: How to Watch TWiT on a Television
data.meta_description: All of our podcasts are available on video and you can watch them a variety of ways on your television.
data.text:
All of our podcasts are available on video and you can watch them a variety of ways on your television.

Smart TVs

Look for a YouTube app. Search for your favorite TWiT podcasts by name and make sure to subscribe to the channel.

Samsung smart TVs and Blu-ray players have access to a fan-created TWiT app which can be installed.

If you have a TV with Roku, we hope to release a working TWiT app soon.

Set-Top Boxes

Apple TV

The Apple Podcasts app will allow you to listen to or watch TWiT podcasts. Subscribe to see new episodes as they're available.

Install the YouTube app and search for your favorite TWiT podcasts by name to watch via YouTube. Make sure to subscribe to the channel.

There are some Apple TV apps for specific TWiT podcasts that you may want to install. Apps exist for Security Now, Tech News Weekly, This Week in Space, FLOSS Weekly, Hands-On Photography, Hands-On Tech, and Triangulation.

Roku

Our TWiT app is currently not working. We hope to rewrite it and get it working soon.

You can find TWiT in the YouTube channel. Search for your favorite TWiT podcasts and make sure you subscribe to that podcast's YouTube channel.

Fire TV

Install the YouTube app. Search for your favorite TWiT podcasts and make sure you subscribe to the channel.

Gaming Consoles

PlayStation

Install the YouTube app and search for your favorite TWiT podcasts by name. Make sure to subscribe to the channel.

Xbox

Install the YouTube app and search for your favorite TWiT podcasts by name. Make sure to subscribe to the channel.

Smart Speakers

Although not connected to your television, you can listen to TWiT podcasts on several brands of smart speakers.

Amazon Alexa

You can hear full episodes by saying, "Alexa, play [NAME OF TWiT PODCAST] on TuneIn."

You can also install the TWiT Flash Briefing skill and get short clips from various TWiT podcasts in your daily Flash Briefing news. The skill is available in the US, Canada, UK, Australia, and India.

Google
